async function filterBy(filterBy) {
  let currBooks = await books;
  let title = filterBy.byName.toLowerCase();
  let fromPrice = filterBy.fromPrice ? parseInt(filterBy.fromPrice) : 0;
  let toPrice = filterBy.toPrice === Infinity ? filterBy.toPrice : parseInt(filterBy.toPrice);

  if (title) {
    currBooks = books.filter(book => book.title.includes(title))
    return currBooks
  }
  if (fromPrice || toPrice) {
    if (toPrice) {
      currBooks = books.filter(book => book.listPrice.amount >= fromPrice && book.listPrice.amount <= toPrice)
      return currBooks
    } else {
      currBooks = books.filter(book => book.listPrice.amount >= fromPrice)
      return currBooks
    }
  }
  return currBooks
}

export default {
  books,
  filterBy
}
